original_title: De Enge Knijperman en de Ondersteboven Vrouw
overview: Short film in which a group of children get to know the Enge Knijperman (the Grisly Pincher Man) who falls madly in love with the Onderstebovenvrouw (Upside-down Woman). However the 220-Volt-Witch and the Toilet Slave set out to spoil things.  Experimental short by Aryan Kaganof, made under his birth name Ian Kerkhof.
title: The Creepy Pegman and The Upsidedown Woman
